overview: Systemic changes begin in Poland, and the young and ambitious Tekla begins a legal career ...  The action begins on New Year's Eve 1988 - the last one in the history of the Polish People's Republic. Soon the old order will collapse. Polish business will be born, often in an atmosphere of scandal, and great fortunes will suddenly arise out of nothing and disappear just as quickly. Only the most persistent, the most aggressive and the smartest will achieve success.
title: Sukces
